books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.description: A gripping mystery that follows journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander as they investigate a decades-old disappearance.

books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.title: Gone Girl
books.description: A psychological thriller revolving around the mysterious disappearance of Amy Dunne and the subsequent media frenzy and suspicions surrounding her husband Nick.

books.author: Dan Brown
books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.description: A fast-paced mystery thriller where symbologist Robert Langdon unravels clues across Europe to solve a murder and uncover a centuries-old secret.

books.author: Liane Moriarty
books.title: Big Little Lies
books.description: A suspenseful novel set in a tranquil seaside town, where secrets and lies among a group of mothers lead to a tragic event.

books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.title: The Silent Patient
books.description: A psychological thriller featuring a woman who hasn't spoken since she allegedly murdered her husband, and the psychotherapist determined to uncover the truth.

books.author: Jane Austen
books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.description: A classic romance novel that follows the tumultuous relationship between the independent Elizabeth Bennet and the proud Mr. Darcy in 19th-century England.

books.author: Diana Gabaldon
books.title: Outlander
books.description: A time-traveling romance saga that begins when Claire Randall, a WWII nurse, is transported from 1945 to 1743 Scotland, where she falls in love with a Highland warrior.

books.author: Jojo Moyes
books.title: Me Before You
books.description: A heartwarming and bittersweet love story between a quirky young woman named Louisa and a paralyzed man named Will, who teaches her about living life to the fullest.

books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.title: The Notebook
books.description: An enduring love story between Noah and Allie, whose romance spans decades despite social differences and personal obstacles.

books.author: Casey McQuiston
books.title: Red, White & Royal Blue
books.description: A contemporary romance novel featuring the unexpected love affair between the First Son of the United States and a British prince.
keywords: First Son of the United States

books.author: Frank Herbert
books.title: Dune
books.description: A sweeping science fiction epic set in a distant future where noble houses battle for control over a desert planet called Arrakis, known for its valuable spice.

books.author: Andy Weir
books.title: The Martian
books.description: A gripping survival story about an astronaut stranded on Mars who must use his ingenuity and resourcefulness to stay alive while awaiting rescue.

books.author: William Gibson
books.title: Neuromancer
books.description: A seminal cyberpunk novel that follows a washed-up computer hacker hired for a seemingly impossible heist in a dystopian future where cyberspace is a virtual reality.

books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.title: Ender's Game
books.description: A military science fiction novel that follows gifted child strategist Ender Wiggin as he trains in a battle school to prepare for an impending alien invasion.

books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.title: The Hunger Games
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a future society where teenagers are forced to participate in a televised fight to the death, as Katniss Everdeen fights for survival and rebellion.

books.author: Hilary Mantel
books.title: Wolf Hall
books.description: A historical fiction masterpiece that chronicles the rise to power of Thomas Cromwell in the court of King Henry VIII, filled with political intrigue and drama.

books.author: Ken Follett
books.title: The Pillars of the Earth
books.description: A sweeping historical epic set in 12th-century England, depicting the construction of a cathedral amidst political turmoil, love, and betrayal.

books.author: Diana Gabaldon
books.title: The Fiery Cross
books.description: Part of the Outlander series, this historical fiction novel continues the adventures of Claire Randall and Jamie Fraser as they navigate the challenges of colonial America.

books.author: Philippa Gregory
books.title: The Other Boleyn Girl
books.description: A captivating historical novel that tells the story of Mary Boleyn and her sister Anne, who vie for the affection of King Henry VIII amidst the intrigue of the Tudor court.

books.author: Anthony Doerr
books.title: All the Light We Cannot See
books.description: Set during World War II, this historical fiction novel follows the intersecting lives of a blind French girl and a German soldier, highlighting the power of hope and resilience.
